ygData.subject: Paladins
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright, a while back I posted something in error. Or at least that s what I ve been informed. Paly s do not do more damage than Warriors. They do less.
ygData.messageBody:
Alright, a while back I posted something in
error. Or at least that's what I've been
informed.<br><br>Paly's do not do more damage than Warriors. They do
less. So it'd be Rogues and Monks. Then Warriors and
Rangers (although I think Rangers are generally faster so
do more), and then SK, and then Paly's of the melee
classes.<br><br>Course the Melee's for some reason sometimes object to
the fact that I say-- Wizards in a group generally
deal an average of half the damage. I say-- well so
what if they only cast one or two spells in combat.
When at 30 or so-- they're doing 250 points a pop...
with two spells in combat... they pop for 500hp. At
level 30 or so. LOL<br><br>shooman out<br><br>PS...
Wizzies are a tough class-- agro factor and all. =)Slow
burn babbbbbeeeeeyyyy... lol. Or baby. However, you
prefer to spell it.<br><br>Fatedhue
Prismatic<br>Tribunal of the Antiquities
